\documentclass[12pt]{article}
\usepackage{geometry}
\geometry{margin=1in}
\usepackage{fontspec}
%\setmainfont{TeX Gyre Termes}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{soul}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\definecolor{osugray}{RGB}{105,108,108}
\definecolor{scarlet}{RGB}{196,27,49}
\usepackage{tikz}

\usepackage{titlesec}
\newcommand{\boldunderline}[1]{\textbf{\underline{\textbf{#1}}}}

% for pandoc
\providecommand{\tightlist}{%
  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}}

\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt} % Remove the header rule

\newcommand{\academicyear}{
  \ifnum\month<6
    \number\numexpr\year-1\relax--\the\year%
  \else
    \the\year--\number\numexpr\year+1\relax%
  \fi
}

\fancyfoot[L]{Page \thepage}
\fancyfoot[C]{\academicyear}

\titleformat{\subsection}[runin]% "runin" places the title on the same line as the text
{\normalfont}% bold font and underlined
{}% no label (empty for no numbering)
{0em}% no space between label and title text
{\boldunderline}% before-code
[]% after-code (empty in this case)

\renewcommand{\maketitle}{
\fancyfoot[R]{Math \coursenumber}
\begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture, overlay, inner sep=0pt, outer sep=0pt]
    \node [shift={(-1in,-0.5in)},anchor=north east]  at (current page.north east)
    {\parbox{0.35\textwidth}{\begin{flushright}Mathematics \coursenumber \\ \coursetitle \\ \semesters \\ \credits \end{flushright}}};
    \end{tikzpicture}\vspace{1ex}}
